response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe is tailor-made to meet your needs and expectations. This product holds immense value to me, but I am confident it will bring unparalleled benefits to you, given its worth of $1,000,000 to you.

I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a significant discount from its true value, designed to make this exceptional opportunity more accessible to you while ensuring a fair return on my investment.

Please consider this offer carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to assist you through every step of the process.

Looking forward to your positive response and the possibility of working together.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
